item.title: Eagles Of Death Metal - I Only Want You
item.description: At the request of a subscriber, here's an educational play along video that uses just 2 chords: C and Am. I have another version of it that has other parts on the screen (drums, boomwhackers, etc) that may be found here (https://youtu.be/5Nt1bF5a3j0), but this version is just for ukulele.

item.title: Chitãozinho & Xororó - Pura Emoção
item.description:
Achy Breaky Heart by Billy Ray Cyrus. It’s been raised by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C & G (or C & G7)
SAME SONG IN F (using F and C or C7): https://youtu.be/KsjrpecVEoU
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Scooby Doo Theme Song Ukulele Play Along (In A)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of A.
Chords Used: A, Bm, E, D, D#
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/R-w5qnNS0Uo
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Scooby Doo Theme Song Ukulele Play Along (In G)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
Chords Used: G, Am, D, C, D#, D (alternate position)
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/R-w5qnNS0Uo
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Lil Nas X - Old Town Road
Scooby Doo Theme Song Ukulele Play Along (In G) *Capo Required*
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of A, but chords shown in G to be used with a Capo on the 2nd Fret.
Chords Used: G, Am, D, C, D#, D (alternate position)
Please put a capo on the second fret to play this version of the song!
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/R-w5qnNS0Uo
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Percy Sledge - When a Man Loves a Woman
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Am, Em, F, G7, D7
As performed by Percy Sliedge
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/_iXuaXJSGns
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Background (modified to look like Taylor Swift's "Lover" album cover) is from motionbolt.com.

item.title: Grace VanderWaal - Escape My Mind
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Escape My Mind - Grace VanderWaal
Using the chords: C Cm Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: DU DU DU DU Note play du DU du DU - captials have more accent
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Lift Every Voice And Sing - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Lift Every Voice and Sing by the Abyssinian Baptist Church. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C, F, A7, Dm, Bbdim, Dm, Gm, A, Bb, D, D7
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Sudha - Wendeyaho
item.description:
Wendeyaho (We n’ de ya ho), also known as the Cherokee Morning Song, by Sudha. A rough translation is: I am of the great spirit, yes I am. It’s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner musicians can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C, F, G
Across the USA many states are changing “Columbus Day” to an observance of “Indigenous Peoples' Day”. This is a perfect song for students to play in October, or anytime of the year.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
